title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for Ollama (chat, history, model switching).

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to install Ollama and its CUDA variant declaratively.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community SDK for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama sidecars in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama with comptime JSON parsing.

title: ollama-digitalocean-1-click
summary: DigitalOcean 1-Click App image to spin up a GPU droplet with Ollama pre-installed.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Utility to convert and push Hugging Face models into the Ollama model library format.
